name: Back to Nature (Rajcsányi László (WLS))
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Bob Carr - Commodore Business Machines Ltd. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1984 (Commodore64 version - 1982). Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5! Title graphics by Mermaid/Genesis Project

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Your role is to catch the beetles by hiding in the skin of a frog. Catching a fly increases your energy by 5 calories, but each jump results in a loss of 1 calorie (You starts from 100 calories). The number of jumps and catches of beetles is randomly generated with each attempt. Good luck and don’t sit long in front of the machine, prefer heading to nature. I also only sat here for half a day until the game was done.

Jump: Cursor LEFT or B
Jump higher: Cursor UP or A

Jump: Arrow LEFT or X or CTRL
Jump higher: Arrow UP or Z or ALT

Back To Nature - Commodore Ltd.
